const Card = ({ data }) => { const imgUrl = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500"; let date = "" let overview = `${data.overview.slice(0,170)}...` if (data.release_date) date = data.release_date.slice(0,4) return ( <>

{data.title}{data.vote_average}

{overview}

  • fav
{date}
{data.title}
{`${data.vote_average}`}
); return <> }; export default Card;
